# ARCHIMED-φ user documentation

Welcome to the user documentation for ARCHIMED-φ. 

The ARCHIMED platform website is available at: <https://archimed-platform.github.io/> 

You can navigate through the documentation using your keyboard arrows. Use <i class="fas fa-arrow-alt-circle-up"></i> and <i class="fas fa-arrow-alt-circle-down"></i> while reading a page, and <i class="fas fa-arrow-alt-circle-left"></i> and <i class="fas fa-arrow-alt-circle-right"></i> to navigate between pages.
